modification.title: Modification ‚Äî {0}
modification.select_action: ‚Üê Select an action from the menu
modification.combo_free_entry_note: You can type a value that is not in the list.
modification.combo_no_existing: No existing values found in tenant.
modification.phone_scope_hint: ‚ö† Requires User.ReadWrite.All scope on the Azure AD application.
modification.error_permission_hint: Verify the application has the User.ReadWrite.All scope (not just User.ReadWrite).
modification.error_phone_permission_hint: To modify phone numbers, delegated or application User.ReadWrite.All scope is required.
modification.error_proxy_readonly:
Email aliases cannot be modified via Graph API on Exchange Online mailboxes.

Use the Exchange Admin Center or Exchange Online PowerShell (Set-Mailbox -EmailAddresses).
modification.country_note: Updates both Country AND UsageLocation (required for licenses).
modification.upn_keep_alias: Keep old UPN as Exchange alias (recommended)
modification.upn_alias_note: The old UPN will be added as a secondary smtp: address. Emails sent to the old address will still be received.
modification.aliases_legend: SMTP: (uppercase) = primary address, cannot be removed here   smtp: (lowercase) = secondary aliases

modification.groups_warning: When changing roles, revoke access tied to the previous role. Accumulating rights from different functions violates the principle of least privilege.

modification.groups_none_selected: Please select at least one group.

modification.revoke_success: Sessions revoked. The user will need to sign in again.

modification.confirm_country: Change country to '{0}' for {1}? (UsageLocation updated simultaneously)
modification.confirm_upn_alias: Old UPN '{0}' will be kept as Exchange alias.
modification.error_required_fields: Please fill in all required fields.
modification.groups_search_hint: Search a group by name (min. 2 characters)
modification.error_phone_forbidden:
‚ùå Access denied (403 Forbidden)

The current token does not include the 'User.ReadWrite.All' scope.

‚û° Solution: close and relaunch the tool to obtain a new token,
  then reconnect to the client tenant.

If the error persists, verify that 'User.ReadWrite.All' is granted
with Admin consent in the Entra ID App Registration.
modification.error_forbidden_reconnect:
‚ùå Access denied (403 Forbidden)

The current token does not include the required permissions.

‚û° Solution: close and relaunch the tool to force a new token.
modification.error_proxy_badrequest:
‚ùå Cannot modify email aliases directly via Graph API.

Exchange Online mailboxes manage proxy addresses independently.

‚û° Use instead:
  ‚Ä¢ Exchange Admin Center (EAC) ‚Üí Recipients ‚Üí Mailboxes
  ‚Ä¢ Exchange Online PowerShell: Set-Mailbox -EmailAddresses

shared_mailbox_audit.title: M365 Monster ‚Äî Shared Mailbox Audit
shared_mailbox_audit.header_subtitle: Identify shared mailboxes with an active user account, assigned licenses, or detected interactive sign-in.
shared_mailbox_audit.stats_empty: Click "Load mailboxes" to start the audit.
shared_mailbox_audit.stats_summary: Total: {0} shared mailboxes | Active accounts: {1} | With license: {2} | Sign-in detected: {3} | Displayed: {4}
shared_mailbox_audit.no_selection: Select a shared mailbox to view details.
shared_mailbox_audit.warning_signin: ‚ö† WARNING: An interactive sign-in was detected on {0}. Manual validation required before disabling.
shared_mailbox_audit.warning_no_signin: ‚úî No interactive sign-in detected ‚Äî Disabling the account should not impact operations.
shared_mailbox_audit.disable_success_msg:
The user account linked to mailbox "{0}" has been successfully disabled.

The shared mailbox will continue to function for users with access rights.
shared_mailbox_audit.error_exo_module:
The ExchangeOnlineManagement module is not installed.

Install it with:
Install-Module ExchangeOnlineManagement -Scope CurrentUser

nested_group_audit.title: M365 Monster ‚Äî Mixed Groups Audit (Nested)
nested_group_audit.header_subtitle: Identifies Entra groups containing both users and devices, and associated Intune policies.
nested_group_audit.stats_empty: Click "Scan Groups" to analyze Entra groups.
nested_group_audit.scan_complete: Scan complete ‚Äî {0} groups analyzed ‚Äî {1} mixed group(s) found
nested_group_audit.intune_stats: {0} Intune policy/app(s) reference this group ({1} categories scanned)
nested_group_audit.intune_no_results: No Intune policy or application references this group.
nested_group_audit.no_group_selected: No group selected ‚Äî select a group in the Scan tab.
nested_group_audit.auto_desc_user: Users group separated from mixed group "{0}" ‚Äî created by M365 Monster
nested_group_audit.auto_desc_device: Devices group separated from mixed group "{0}" ‚Äî created by M365 Monster
nested_group_audit.confirm_create_user:
Do you want to create group "{0}" and transfer {1} user(s)?

Members will be ADDED to the new group.
They will NOT be removed from the original group.
nested_group_audit.confirm_create_device:
Do you want to create group "{0}" and transfer {1} device(s)?

Members will be ADDED to the new group.
They will NOT be removed from the original group.
nested_group_audit.success_create_group:
Group "{0}" has been created successfully.

{1} member(s) added, {2} error(s).
nested_group_audit.error_create_group: Error while creating the group. Check the action log.
nested_group_audit.footer: M365 Monster ‚Äî Mixed Groups Audit (Nested Groups)
